title: Ninja Woodfire Outdoor Grill OG701 – Electric BBQ & Smoker – All-in-One, Black
description: Pre-owned Ninja Woodfire OG701 electric outdoor grill, smoker, and BBQ combo. Ideal for grilling, smoking, and air frying outdoors with real woodfire flavor. Features a nonstick grill grate, multiple cooking functions, and weather-resistant design. Fully tested, in excellent working condition. Includes original components as shown.
